metadata.Title: TempMin (Minimum temperature calculation)
metadata.Extended description: TempMin recalculates the daily minimum air temperature to account for snow insulation. If snow depth Sdepth_cm exceeds a threshold prof, the minimum temperature is constrained within [tminseuil, tmaxseuil]. If 0 < Sdepth_cm ≤ prof, the component linearly adjusts toward tminseuil according to snow depth: tminrec = tminseuil − (1 − Sdepth_cm/prof) × (|tmin| + tminseuil). Otherwise, tminrec = tmin. Inputs: Sdepth_cm (cm), prof (cm), tmin (°C), tminseuil (°C), tmaxseuil (°C). Output: tminrec (°C). Time step: daily. Implemented as Fortran90 subroutine model_tempmin in module Tempminmod.
metadata.Short description: Recalculates minimum air temperature under snow cover by clamping or interpolating based on snow depth.
